answerText: The Good Soldier[10] The Good Soldier was written by this English author of the Parade's End tetralogy.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Illinois A + Dorman A + Wellesley | 20 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel opens with the line "This is the saddest story I have ever heard". For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel about the philandering Captain Edward Ashburnham, narrated by John Dowell, whose wife Florence pretends to have a heart ailment
